name: The Hunt (itch) (vigneshgovind1)
description:
Note: Launch the game in full screen for the best experience.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys

Pause: ESC button

Total Levels: 6 (including tutorial level)

Dave is a company employee being held hostage by a rogue company. Help Dave escape the maze-like company facility alive while hiding from enemies!

This game was made for "MY FIRST GAME JAM: SUMMER 2021".

This is my first complete game, I hope you enjoy playing it! :)
